oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Handmade ring
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Split reed or pinewood ring with colorful case. Written in pencil on the round cap is, "Carried by Papa through War between States." Item was found in a sewing case in Nashville. Donated to TSLA at the Looking Back event.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
